title: Inside Nvidia HQ: Here's What a $2 Trillion Company's Office Looks Like
text: Inside Nvidia HQ: Here’s What a $2 Trillion Company’s Office Looks Like Nvidia’s headquarters is now one of the most sought-after places to work. Spanning more than 1 million square feet combined, Nvidia’s space-ship-like buildings were designed with help from custom software powered by the AI chips that have made the company successful. WSJ gets a look inside. Photo: Nvidia Wall Street Journal March 1, 2024 7:46 In-Depth Features A global look at the economic and cultural forces shaping our world.
